item.description:
At the next meetUp we will discuss New York Times bestseller The Late Great USA: The Coming Merger with Mexico and Canada, Author Dr. Jerome Corsi proves that the benignly-named "Security and Prosperity Partnership," created at a meeting between George W. Bush, Stephen Harper and Vincente Fox, is in fact the same kind of regional integration plan that led Europe to form the EU.

Please read the book.
Come to the next meeting to discuss.
And Please BRING A FRIEND!!!

"Dr. Corsi has connected the dots between the Security and Prosperity Partnership, the sale of toll roads and other infrastructure to foreign companies, and proposals for a North American Union with open borders between Mexico, the U.S., and Canada. The Late Great U.S.A. is an essential read for anyone concerned about the future independence and sovereignty of the United States."
-Phyllis Schlafly, President, Eagle Forum


TEASER FOR THIS BOOK CLUB SELECTION:
watch Ohio Democrat, Marcy Kaptur
http://www.youtube.co...

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: The Late Great USA
